modPluginOrder_comment: Add exception for mod: [plugins] below here if default plugin order is incorrect

delinquent.TAWOBA Remastered Leveled List.esp: The Amazing World of Bikini Armors REMASTERED.esp

bottomMods_comment: Plugins that should be moved to the bottom should be placed here in the required order.
Generic ordering: Adapt below here to adapt default plugin ordering. Earlier matches get higher priority.
increasingPriority_comment: Regexps/strings that generally increase priority for a plugins installed by a mod.
Game specific: Only adapt below here if your game is not Skyrim SE - Fallout4 has a different masterlist
masters_comment: Plugins placed in front, with lowest priority. Non-Skyrim requires a different list.
